pageProps.title: Examples of 2D Games That Use Parallax Scrolling Effectively
pageProps.metaDesc: Parallax scrolling is a technique used in 2D video games to create an illusion of depth by moving multiple layers of images at different speeds. This effect can be used to create a sense of depth, motion, and immersion in a game's environment. In this article, we will explore some examples of 2D games that use parallax scrolling effectively.
